Groups.Name: Main
Groups.DisplayName: DLC (two mods must to be placed below Sound Overhaul Pack)

Elements.Name: IncludeDir17
Description:
Adds default gameplay and object sounds on top using the Inugami Korone Collaboration DLC sounds.
Choose your desired sound preset according to your selected in in the Gameplay category.

Note(s):
- You are required to have the Inugami Korone Collaboration DLC mod in order to make it work and place it below Sound Overhaul Pack.

Same for Sonic Emote with Koco DLC!

Elements.Name: IncludeDir16
Elements.DisplayName: Sonic Emote with Koco DLC Language
Description:
Choose your desired language for the Sonic Emote with Koco DLC.

Note(s):
- You are required to have the Sonic Emote with Koco DLC mod in order to make it work and place it below Sound Overhaul Pack.

Same for Inugami Korone Collaboration DLC!

Elements.Name: IncludeDir8
Description: Toggle a language of your liking to play during Super Sonic's Titan Sequences or to turn them off, making Sonic mute as he is in the vanilla game.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir6
Description: Toggle a language of your liking to play during Guardian Intros or to turn them off, making Sonic mute as he is in the vanilla game.

Elements.Name: FlightTired
Description: Choose your desired language.

Elements.Name: SuperGrandSlam
Description: Choose your desired language.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir12
Elements.DisplayName: The End's Monologue in Another Story
Description: Choose to either enable or disable The End's monologue in Another Story.

Elements.Name: ZeroRingWarning
Description:
Restores an unused jingle that is meant to play when you have zero rings.

Note(s):
- This will play only when you have zero rings after taking damage.
- The jingle will (normally) play when you start the tutorial. If you use the ''Keep Rings from Cyber Space on Islands'' code, it won't conflict :)

Elements.Name: RestoreCameraGaze
Description: Restores an unused jingle that is meant to play when you press the analog stick when you lock on to a target.

Elements.Name: PulleyExtra
Description:
Adds additional sounds for the pulley, a new sound will be added and stopped once the player is out of the pulley.

Note(s):
- Sometimes the sounds will play at random cases since the associated state is shared with others.
More particularly when interacting with the cannons in Another Story and the rocket in Portal 4-B.

Elements.Name: ForcesSpin
Description:
Adds spinning sound when jumping and bouncing, similar to Sonic Forces
In Sonic Frontiers, the sound normally plays when jumping off an enemy.

Note(s):
- This is will not apply to the Double Jump. 
- It will play for Amy too, but only when she jumps out of a Spin Dash since she normally doesn't curl into a ball.

Elements.Name: LightDashImpact
Description: Adds the Light Dash impact from both Adventure titles.

Elements.Name: BoostJet
Description: Restores the jet sound that plays when the player boosts, similar to previous titles.

Elements.Name: SonicDriftBoost
Description: Adds a boost sound for Sonic when pressing the Boost button during a Drift instead of not playing a thing, just like previous titles.

Elements.Name: QuickStep
Description:
Restores the Quick Step sounds from previous titles
Choose your desired Quick Step sound.

Elements.Name: SkyDiveUnleashed
Description: Adds the high quality Sky Dive sounds from Sonic Unleashed.

Elements.Name: KnucklesClimb
Description: Adds additional climb sounds for Knuckles from SONIC THE HEDGEHOG (2006).

Elements.Name: AmyDoubleJumpNEXT
Description: Adds an additional Double Jump sound for Amy, like in SONIC THE HEDGEHOG (2006).

Elements.Name: AmyDrift
Description: Additional drift sounds for Amy's Tarot Bike Drift.

Elements.Name: CyberAuraFriends
Description:
Gives Tails, Knuckles and Amy their Cyber form aura from the cutscenes into gameplay.

Recommended for those who use / prefer their Cyber forms

Note(s):
- This code is experimental and may contain minor imperfections that are not expected to function flawlessly, thus I recommend for you to keep this option off for now until it'll be far more flashed. Or keep it on, totally up to you.
- When you switch to Tails, Knuckles and Amy, the aura sound will not play until they're standing still or falling, for some reason.
- The aura may reset or overplay when you perform some actions or become grounded.

Elements.Name: SuperSonicBoostPrimary
Description:
Note: This is the boost sound from Sonic Generations / Lost World Forces.

Gives Super Sonic a unique boost sound like in previous titles rather than reusing the default one.

Elements.Name: SuperSonicBoostSecondary
Description:
Note: This is the boost sound from Sonic Unleashed during the Perfect Dark Gaia fight.

Gives Super Sonic a unique boost sound like in previous titles rather than reusing the default one.

Elements.Name: SuperSonicDrift
Description: Gives Super Sonic a unique drift sound.

Elements.Name: SS2Aura
Description:
Adds Super Sonic 2's (hard-to-hear) aura from the cutscenes and quick-time events into gameplay.

Note(s):
- The aura sound may play in a few cutscenes / scenarios (when THE END reconnects its cable to Supreme), a fix is unknown at the moment.

-- The aura sound will play for a few seconds after Supreme's defeat (when the screen goes black) but will stop when the final cutscene plays.

Elements.Name: cameragazeVolume
Description: Adjust the volume for the Camera Gaze. Min: 0, Max: 100
(Default: 25)

Elements.Name: rollVolume
Description: Adjust the volume for the Spin Dash / Roll Release. Min: 0, Max: 100
(Default: 25)

Elements.Name: dreamcastlightdashVolume
Description: Adjust the volume for the Dreamcast-styled Light Dash. Min: 0, Max: 100
(Default: 25)

Elements.Name: boostjetVolume
Description: Adjust the volume for the Boost Jet. Min: 0, Max: 100
(Default: 25)

Elements.Name: quickstepVolume
Description: Adjust the volume for the Quick Step. Min: 0, Max: 100
(Default: 25)

Elements.Name: skydiveVolume
Description: Adjust the volume for the Sky Dive (normal speed). Min: 0, Max: 100
(Default: 25)

Elements.Name: skydivefastVolume
Description: Adjust the volume for the Sky Dive (fast speed). Min: 0, Max: 100
(Default: 25)

Elements.Name: tailsstompVolume
Description: Adjust the volume for the Tails Spin at Stomp. Min: 0, Max: 100
(Default: 25)

Elements.Name: knucklesclimbVolume
Description: Adjust the volume for the 2006-styled Climb. Min: 0, Max: 100
(Default: 25)

Elements.Name: heatknuckleVolume
Description: Adjust the volume for the Heat Knuckle. Min: 0, Max: 100
(Default: 25)

Elements.Name: superboostprimaryVolume
Description: Adjust the volume for the Super Boost (Primary). Min: 0, Max: 100
(Default: 25)

Elements.Name: superboostsecondaryVolume
Description: Adjust the volume for the Super Boost (Secondary). Min: 0, Max: 100
(Default: 25)

Elements.Name: superdriftVolume
Description: Adjust the volume for the Super Drift. Min: 0, Max: 100
(Default: 25)

Elements.Name: ss2Volume
Elements.DisplayName: Starfall Super Sonic / Super Sonic 2 Aura
Description: Adjust the volume for Starfall Super Sonic / Super Sonic 2's Aura. Min: 0, Max: 100
(Default: 25)

Elements.Name: ss2transprimaryVolume
Elements.DisplayName: Starfall Super Sonic / Super Sonic 2 Transformation (Primary)
Description: Adjust the volume for Starfall Super Sonic / Super Sonic 2 Transformation (Primary) Min: 0, Max: 100
(Default: 25)

Elements.Name: ss2transsecondaryVolume
Elements.DisplayName: Starfall Super Sonic / Super Sonic 2 Transformation (Secondary)
Description: Adjust the volume for Starfall Super Sonic / Super Sonic 2 Transformation (Secondary) Min: 0, Max: 100
(Default: 25)

Elements.Name: tiredgruntVolume
Description: Adjust the volume for Tired Grunt. Min: 0, Max: 100
(Default: 25)

Elements.Name: supergrantslamVolume
Description: Adjust the volume for Super Grand Slam Grunt. Min: 0, Max: 100
(Default: 25)

Elements.Name: pulleyVolume
Description: Adjust the volume for the Pulley. Min: 0, Max: 100
(Default: 25)

Elements.Name: IncludeDir0
Description: Choose the sound preset of your liking for Sonic.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir1
Description: Choose the sound preset of your liking for Tails.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir2
Description: Choose the sound preset of your liking for Knuckles.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir3
Description: Choose the sound preset of your liking for Amy.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir21
Description:
Choose the sound preset of your liking for the game objects

Note(s):
- You must follow each of your characters' selected preset to use the option that is suited for it in order to make it work and sound properly.

-This applies to general objects and Sonic's Birthday Bash.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir4
Description: Choose a variety of different sounds for the Spin Dash.

Elements.Name: SpinDashImpact
Description: Choose to enable or disable mod compatibility.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir7
Description: Determine if you wish to keep ''Mystery Girl'' or replace it with each Titan's instrumental theme when encountering them for the first time.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir9
Description: Choose the boss theme for The End.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir10
Description: Determine which version of Ouranos Island you wish to play when in Another Story.
Gives Super Sonic his unique boost sound that he had in Sonic Generations, Lost World, and Forces.
Gives Super Sonic the unique boost sound that he had in Sonic Unleashed during the Perfect Dark Gaia fight.
A mix between the two.
Disables Super Sonic's new boost sound.
Enables the spin jump sound.
Disables the spin jump sound.
Default settings.
Adds compatibility with Loco's Reimagined Slide.
Disables the Spin Dash / Roll release impact.

Gives Tails, Knuckles, and Amy their Cyber form aura from the cutscenes into gameplay.

This is an experimental code, so it might not work as intended at times.

Tails, Knuckles, and Amy's Cyber forms emit no aura sound.

I'd recommend leaving this option disabled until it'll be fixed, but up to you.
Enables Boost Jet sound.
Leaves the Boost unchanged.
Gives Super Sonic 2 a unique aura sound.
Disables Super Sonic 2's aura.
Restores an unused jingle that is meant to play when you have zero rings.
No sound will play when the player has zero rings.
Gives Amy additional sounds for her Tarot Bike Drift.
Keeps Amy's Tarot Bike Drift unchanged.
Applys Amy's Double Jump / short hop to her Double Jump.
Applys Amy's Double Jump / short hop to her Tarot Card Propeller Jump.
Applys Amy's Double Jump / short hop to both conditions..
No short hop plays.
Adds Rouge's climbing sounds from SONIC THE HEDGEHOG (2006) on top of Knuckles' wall climbing.
Keeps Knuckles' climbing sounds unchanged.
Adds boost sounds when Sonic boosts during a drift.
No sound will play when Sonic boosts during a drift.
Gives Super Sonic his unique boost sound that he had in Sonic Generations, Lost World, and Forces.
Disables Super Sonic's new boost sound.
Gives Super Sonic the unique boost sound that he had in Sonic Unleashed during the Perfect Dark Gaia fight.
Disables Super Sonic's new boost sound.
Enables Super Sonic's unique drifting sound.
Disables Super Sonic's drifting sound.
Restores an unused jingle that is meant to play when you press the analog stick when you lock on to a target.
No sound will play when you press the analog stick when you lock on to a target.
Adds additional sounds for the pulley from Sonic Unleashed.
Adds additional sounds for the pulley from the Dreamcast games / SONIC THE HEDGEHOG (2006)
No sound will play when you interact with the pulley.
Enables the Quick Step sound from Sonic Unleashed.
Enables the Quick Step sound from Sonic Colors (and Generations...?)
Leaves the Quick Step unchanged.
Enables the Light Dash impact from the Dreamcast games.
Leaves the Light Dash unchanged.
Enables the higher quality Sky Dive sounds from Sonic Unleashed.
Leaves theSky Dive unchanged.
Improving the vanilla sounds by restoring sound details inspired by previous titles and replacing existing sounds with higher quality versions.
Replaces the vanilla footsteps sounds with those from previous titles.

GameplaySonicEnum.DisplayName: Vanilla Overhaul (Frontiers) - Vanilla Footsteps + No Air Tricks
Description: Improving the vanilla sounds by restoring sound details inspired by previous titles and replacing existing sounds with higher quality versions, without the new Air Tricks sound.

GameplaySonicEnum.DisplayName: Vanilla Overhaul (Frontiers) - Alternative Footsteps + No Air Tricks
Description: Replaces the vanilla footsteps sounds with those from previous titles, without the new Air Tricks sound.
Replaces the modified Frontiers sounds with those from Boost Era games (Unleashed, Colors, Generations and Lost World)
Replaces the modified Frontiers sounds with those from Boost Era games (Unleashed, Colors, Generations and Lost World), and includes footsteps sounds from previous games.

GameplaySonicEnum.DisplayName: Boost Era - Vanilla Footsteps + No Air Tricks
Description: Replaces the modified Frontiers sounds with those from Boost Era games (Unleashed, Colors, Generations and Lost World), without the new Air Tricks sound.

GameplaySonicEnum.DisplayName: Boost Era - Alternative Footsteps + No Air Tricks
Description: Replaces the modified Frontiers sounds with those from Boost Era games (Unleashed, Colors, Generations and Lost World), includes footsteps sounds from previous games, without the new Air Tricks sound.
Replaces the modified Frontiers sounds with those from Dreamcast Era games
Replaces the modified Frontiers sounds with those from Dreamcast Era games, and includes footsteps sounds from previous games.

GameplaySonicEnum.DisplayName: Dreamcast Era - Vanilla Footsteps + SA2 Jump
Description: Replaces the modified Frontiers sounds with those from Dreamcast Era games, with the jump sound from Sonic Adventure 2 / Heroes.

GameplaySonicEnum.DisplayName: Dreamcast Era - Alternative Footsteps + SA2 Jump
Description: Replaces the modified Frontiers sounds with those from Dreamcast Era games, with the jump sound from Sonic Adventure 2 / Heroes.
Merges sounds from each Preset into one presets.
Merges sounds from each Preset into one presets, and includes footsteps sounds from previous games.

GameplaySonicEnum.DisplayName: Hybrid - Vanilla Footsteps + No Air Tricks
Description: Merges sounds from each Preset into one presets, without the new Air Tricks sound.

GameplaySonicEnum.DisplayName: Hybrid - Alternative Footsteps + No Air Tricks
Description: Merges sounds from each Preset into one presets, includes footsteps sounds from previous games, without the new Air Tricks sound.

Adds the Drop Dash charging sound, making it faithful to Frontiers and the Unleashed Spin Dash charge sound.

Not the ideal choice but whatever, I included it for fun.

I have to admit, Roget sucks when it comes to recording voice clips for dying :/
